TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed DisplayMode extends System.Enum

summary.span: Defines identifiers that indicate the display modes used by .

span.span: Defines identifiers that indicate the display modes used by .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 식별자 각 바이트 시퀀스를 표시 하는 데 디스플레이 모드를 나타내는 데 사용 됩니다.The identifiers are used to indicate the display mode used to display each byte sequence. ## Examples 다음 코드 예제에서는 사용 하는 방법을 보여 줍니다. 식별자입니다.The following code example demonstrates how to use identifiers. 이 코드 예제는에 대해 제공 된 큰 예제의 일부는 클래스입니다.This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ComponentModel.Design.DisplayMode Auto = int32(4)

summary.span: A display mode that automatically selects a display mode.

span.span: A display mode that automatically selects a display mode.

summary.span: In this mode, the bytes are examined to determine if they are hexadecimal or printable.

span.span: In this mode, the bytes are examined to determine if they are hexadecimal or printable.

summary.span: If the bytes are in hexadecimal format, the mode is selected.

span.span: If the bytes are in hexadecimal format, the mode is selected.

summary.span: If the characters match a printable character set, a test is run to automatically select either the or display mode.

span.span: If the characters match a printable character set, a test is run to automatically select either the or display mode.
